title: Alistar buffer working through CC
body:
I hit an Alistar with an Ahri charm as he was headbutting me and he still did his knockup when he reached me.

I understand charm doesn't stop dashes anymore, but it's bs that his pulverize went through.

Has anyone else seen this with different types of CC or is it limited to Ahri charm only?

replies.body: Alistar will Q through CC if the command to do so was buffered mid W before the CC hit him. That was the case with the previous W+Q combo too so when we added the buffer to make the combo reliable when playing with higher ping we decided to match the existing functionality.

>
> Not as broken as every single champion in the game synergizing with sated devourer and rageblade :P

Actually a lot of them don't and rage blade is only good on a select few champs.
It just seems rather unfair, especially when up against an AP Alistar. You hit your CC so he can't one-shot you by landing his full combo, and you die anyways :(

Awhile back they changed something with the alistar W,Q combo. They buffered it meaning when you press W and Q on the target it automatically Q's when it reaches the destination so you cant mess it up pressing it to late or to early.
Yes, but if you're CC'd it shouldn't go off.

Seems like anything to do with buffers will always go off through cc's. Possibly with the exception of displacement cc's.

J4's EQ is the most noticeable of them all. CC him? Sorry, he already buffered it, and now he's miles away.
